title: Ep. 56. The Suffering Game - Chapter Six
description: Our heroes are forced to square off against their deadliest former foes -- but their real challenge comes in the form of a danger the likes of which they've never experienced. Taako gets primal. Merle gets disconnected. Magnus gets a couple of helping hands.
author: shows@themcelroy.family (The McElroys)
